verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: russia] - [V: backed] [ARG1: tv channel] rt is gone from dc - area broadcasts in early february the network was taken off the air by a northern virginia tv station rt had remained on area cable channels until midnight sunday when the station permanently closed united states department of justice commonwealth public broadcasting corporation mhz networks president frederick thomas jim heintz curtis monk federal government of the united states george washington university margarita simonyan anna belkina
